hero.name: Loïc PHILIPPE
hero.description: Student at Epitech Mulhouse, I'm developing my programming skills and exploring the fascinating world of software development, DevOps, and video games.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a student at Epitech Mulhouse, passionate about programming and game development. I'm currently learning new programming languages and exploring DevOps.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use in my projects

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover some of my recent projects, ranging from web and game development to shell development.

gamedev.title: Illusion - Horror Game
gamedev.description: This project is our entry for the 2025 Epitech game jam. The theme for this year's jam is 'Illusion'. We have created a horror game that plays with the concept of illusion to deliver a unique and thrilling experience.

secureshot.title: SecureShot - Photo Selling Platform
secureshot.description: Secure platform for photo sales with PayPal payments. Developed with React, TailwindCSS, Node.js, Express, and Supabase. Features session management, role-based access (photographer/buyer), and secure payment processing. I mainly handled frontend development.

ai.title: AI Assistant Tool
ai.description: An app using AI to automate certain development tasks and boost productivity.

comingSoon.title: New Project Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: The repository is not public yet, so I can't share much for now. Stay tuned!

pokoban.title: Pokoban
pokoban.description: Pokoban is a themed version of the classic puzzle game Sokoban, where the player pushes Pokémon-themed boxes around a warehouse, trying to get them to storage locations. This implementation of Sokoban is written in C using SFML.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's talk about your next project
